title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Cox Automotive's Blueprint for Agentic AI on Amazon Bedrock AgentCore (IND3329)
title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Cox Automotive 基于 Amazon Bedrock AgentCore 的智能体 AI 蓝图 (IND3329)
abstract: Learn how Cox Automotive scaled Agentic AI from experimentation to production in just one month using Amazon Bedrock AgentCore and Strands. We'll share Cox's methodology for scaling Agentic AI, including reference architectures and governance frameworks that enable startup speed with enterprise controls. Discover how AgentCore primitives—runtime, identity, gateway, and memory—accelerated their journey. Hear directly from the implementation teams and leave with actionable frameworks, architectural patterns, and governance models to accelerate your organization's Agentic AI initiatives.
abstract_cn: 了解Cox Automotive如何使用Amazon Bedrock AgentCore和Strands在短短一个月内将代理AI从实验阶段扩展到生产环境。我们将分享Cox扩展代理AI的方法论，包括参考架构和治理框架，这些框架能够在企业级控制下实现初创公司般的速度。探索AgentCore原语——运行时、身份、网关和内存——如何加速他们的发展历程。直接听取实施团队的经验分享，并获得可操作的框架、架构模式和治理模型，以加速您组织的代理AI计划。

presenter.name: Brian Lloyd-Newberry
presenter.title: AVP Architecture - Cox Automotive Technology Innovation Lab
